comments: Version 3.1.M1. AssertionFailedException when selecting 'delete method declaration' of in-lined method in preview dialog. I selected the method: /** Get the log category for this package for stop/close information. */ public static Logger getLOG_STOP() { return LOG_STOP; } For in-lining with the delete option. LOG_STOP is defined as: protected static Logger LOG_STOP = Logger.getLogger("com.seagullsw.appinterface.server.comm.ibmmq.stop"); When I choose to preview and select the node 'delete method Can reproduce in 3.1 M2. Dirk please have a look.
It seems as if a MultiEdit's region is not updated in this scenario.
